Pencil Sharpener with LED Lighting: This pencil sharpener would come with an LED light that illuminates the area the pencil be sharpened, making it easier to see and sharpen the pencil in low-light situations.

Smart Pencil Sharpener: This pencil sharpener would come with a mobile app that track the number of times the pencil has been sharpened, the length of the pencil that has been sharpened, and the number of times the pencil has been broken.
Pencil Sharpener with Storage: This pencil sharpener would come with a built-in storage compartment for the pencil shavings, making it easy to keep your workspace clean and organized.

Pencil Sharpener with Augmented Reality: This pencil sharpener would come with an augmented reality feature that allows you to see the inside of the pencil and see how much pencil has been sharpened, making it easier to know when it's time to sharpen the pencil again.

Pencil Sharpener with Voice Activation: This pencil sharpener would come with voice activation technology, allowing you to sharpen your pencil without having to touch any buttons or knobs, making it easy to use hands-free.
